parse: Adverb
str2: When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Article - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: High priest, chief priest. From arche and hiereus; the high-priest; by extension a chief priest.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: From hupo and a derivative of eresso; an under-oarsman, i.e. subordinate.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Properly, to stare at, i.e. to discern clearly; by extension, to attend to; by Hebraism, to experience; passively, to appear.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To cry aloud, shout, exclaim. From krauge; to clamor.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Pilate. Of Latin origin; close-pressed, i.e. Firm; Pilatus, a Roman.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Conjunction
str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.

parse: Adverb
str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Noun - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: From the same as aiteo; a cause, i.e. reason, crime.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
